# vacccprogress

Code for [vacccprogress Twitter bot](https://twitter.com/vacccprogress) Twitter bot. 

Tweets daily COVID-19 Vaccination progress. 

Data taken from [Our World In Data](https://ourworldindata.org/covid-vaccinations).
